wordpressPost.title: Art of cool
wordpressPost.content: Someone (I won't say it was metron) notified me today via a lovely PM that Marc Tauss a.k.a metron has a new website with his, if I can be the judge, amazingly awesome art. It features his photo illustrations, a style I've always adored, and apparently some other stuff. You should check it out.
